pages.index: Royal Green: Your Elegant Haven of Luxury About Rooms Casino Order Luxuriate in Comfort at Royal Green Welcome to Royal Green – your oasis of luxury on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea. Indulge in impeccable service and exquisite style in our cozy rooms overlooking lush gardens and the azure sky. Relax by our poolside with a cocktail in hand or explore local attractions with our curated excursions. Your perfect getaway begins here, at Royal Green. Available rooms 12 Rooms booked 22 The end of the discount 10 days Rooms LUXURY EXPERIENCE Our Luxury Rooms Green Oasis This room embodies a unique concept of modern design inspired by lush green oases. Immerse yourself in a tranquil atmosphere of harmony, enjoying views of our indoor gardens right from the comfort of your bed. Ideal for those seeking solitude and natural beauty. large bed 34 Inc TV Sunlit Breeze Wake up to the morning sun and delight in spectacular sea views from the balcony of this room. The unique architecture of the "Sunlit Breeze" room creates a sensation of floating above the waves, allowing guests to enjoy the endless blue directly from a comfortable lounger. large bed 32 Inc TV Vintage Luxury This room surprises with its unique atmosphere of vintage luxury inspired by the Hollywood glamour of the 1950s. The combination of elegant antique interiors with modern amenities creates an unparalleled experience of timeless elegance and comfort. large bed 42 Inc TV See all rooms FACILITIES Local Activities Sunset Yoga Sessions Join us for rejuvenating sunset yoga sessions on our panoramic terrace, where you can stretch and unwind against the backdrop of a mesmerizing Mediterranean sunset. Farm-to-Table Experience Immerse yourself in a culinary journey with our farm-to-table experience. Explore local markets with our chef, handpick fresh ingredients, and savor a personalized cooking class. Stargazing Nights Experience the magic of stargazing under the clear European skies. Our expert guides will lead you through a celestial journey, pointing out constellations and sharing fascinating insights about the night sky's wonders. TESTIMONIALS Satisfied Customers "Staying in the 'Green Oasis' room was like entering a serene sanctuary. The indoor garden view was breathtaking, and the room's design was both modern and soothing. Perfect for unwinding after a day exploring the city." Emily R. A Tranquil Escape "The 'Sunlit Breeze' room offered stunning views of the Mediterranean sunset from the balcony. The room was beautifully decorated, and falling asleep to the sound of the waves was a dream come true. Would definitely return!" John S. Sunset Bliss "Staying in the 'Vintage Luxury' room was like stepping back in time to old Hollywood glamour. The mix of antique furnishings with modern amenities was exquisite. Every detail was thoughtfully curated, making our stay feel truly luxurious." Sophia L. Vintage Charm "We had an amazing time in the 'Green Oasis' room. The view of the inner garden was mesmerizing, and the atmosphere was incredibly peaceful. The staff was attentive and made our stay truly unforgettable. Can't wait to come back!" Michael B. pages.about: Luxury Charm: Exquisite Royal Green Room About Rooms Casino Order ABOUT Experience Elevated Hospitality at Royal Green. Where Luxury Meets Comfort. Welcome to Royal Green Nestled along the picturesque Mediterranean coast, Royal Green hotel offers the perfect blend of luxury and comfort for your ideal getaway. Our hotel is a true haven of tranquility and sophistication in the heart of Europe, where every detail—from exquisite rooms to top-notch service—is designed to make your stay unforgettable. Rooms at Royal Green range from modern designs with sea views to uniquely themed suites inspired by vintage luxury. Each room is crafted to satisfy the most discerning tastes and provide maximum comfort. Guests can enjoy leisurely strolls through our manicured gardens, relax by the pool with panoramic views, or explore local attractions with our curated excursions. Our Promise From the moment you arrive, our attentive staff ensures your every need is met, whether you're seeking relaxation by our poolside oasis or embarking on local adventures guided by our knowledgeable concierge team. Our meticulously designed rooms offer a retreat inspired by both modern sophistication and timeless charm, promising a restful night's sleep and breathtaking views to awaken your senses each morning. At Royal Green, our promise is to exceed your expectations and create memories that linger long after your departure. Welcome to a world of unparalleled luxury and hospitality—welcome to Royal Green. Meet Our Professional Team At Royal Green, our team of professionals is dedicated to ensuring your stay exceeds every expectation. With a wealth of experience in hospitality and a passion for excellence, each member of our team is committed to providing personalized service that reflects our commitment to luxury and comfort. From our attentive front desk staff who greet you with a warm smile and seamless check-in, to our knowledgeable concierge team ready to curate your perfect itinerary, every interaction is handled with care and expertise. Our housekeeping team ensures immaculate cleanliness in every room, while our skilled chefs craft culinary masterpieces that celebrate the flavors of the Mediterranean. Behind the scenes, our management team works tirelessly to maintain the highest standards of service and hospitality, ensuring that every aspect of your experience at Royal Green is flawless. Whether you need assistance with reservations, local recommendations, or special requests, our team is here to make your stay truly memorable. Discover the difference of staying with a team that takes pride in delivering exceptional service. At Royal Green, hospitality is not just a job—it's our passion. Jake Richards Guest Relations Manager Sarah Thompson cleaning lady David Martinez Spa Director C. de Ramón Pérez de Ayala, 12, Puente de Vallecas, 28038 Madrid, Spain About Rooms Order +91-321-5940064 royalgreen@gmail.com Terms of Use Privacy Policy Disclaimer
